statements: SELECT user_name, role FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, role, permission_type FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_name, user_id FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE role = 'user' AND permission_type = 'write';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, permission_type FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE user_id = 2 AND role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, user_name, role FROM neural_network_data_access ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE permission_type = 'read' ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM neural_network_data_access WHERE permission_type = 'write' OR permission_type = 'execute';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1 AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name IN ('Admin', 'Manager');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, password, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_id=1;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions WHERE role_id=2 AND permission_name='read';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN roles r ON u.role=r.role_name INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id=p.role_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN roles r ON u.role=r.role_name;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, role_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password = 'secure123';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u, roles r, permissions p, user_roles ur, role_permissions rp WHERE u.user_id = ur.user_id AND r.role_id = ur.role_id AND r.role_id = rp.role_id AND p.permission_id = rp.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
